long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Color Ball Crash Game online for free

INTRODUCTION
Color Ball Crash is a game where the objective is to crash the ball into the correct color of the circle :)

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Color Ball Crash extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Color Ball Crash icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Color Ball Crash popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more games from the top-left menu


HOW TO PLAY?
Mouse: Press to change the color of the ball according to the color corresponding to the circle.
